content:
TERM: Multi-Source Corroboration

DEFINITION:
Requires independent sources/datasets supporting a pattern before persistence; stores provenance hashes.

BLUEPRINT DETAILS:
Requires independent sources/datasets supporting a pattern before persistence; records provenance hashes.

EXAMPLE APPLICATION:
Accepted pagination rule corroborated by vendor docs and production PR notes.

CATEGORY: SystemPolicy

RELATIONSHIPS:
type: Validation; enforced_by: VettingagenT; applies_to: KnowledgegraphintegratoR
